GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
articles.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the matching article_id, which is a numerical value corresponding to the desired article

article.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch
article.author: icellusedkars

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments on an article with the matching article_id, which is a numerical value corresponding to the desired article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Takes a JSON object containing a body and an author and POSTs the comment to the matching article_id, which is a numerical value corresponding to the desired article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates an article with the matching article_id, which is a numerical value corresponding to the desired article.

keys.description: The value to increment the vote count for the specified article by. Negative values will decrement the vote count.

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes the comment with the specified comment_id, which is a numerical value corresponding to the desired comment.
